game.name: Moonfall Ultimate
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Moonfall Ultimate는 인더스트리얼 고딕 세계관을 배경으로 하는 2D 횡 스크롤, 액션 RPG입니다. 솔로, 카우치 코옵 또는 무한 아케이드 모드에서 손으로 그려낸 위험한 세계 속으로 적을 박차고 무찌르며 나아가세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Moonfall Ultimate is a 2D side-scrolling, action-RPG, set in an industrial gothic universe. Hack, slash and cast your way through a treacherous hand-painted world in solo, couch co-op or endless arcade mode.

reviewHighlights.text: Absolutely awfull, refunded after 12 minutes. I had hopes for this game because the art looked great, the facade is over when you start playing. Music...
This game seems unfinished. Too bad, too; lots of potential from the looks of it. Nice artwork. Narration is good. UI is baffling and clunky. Gameplay...
